```{r setup, echo=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo=FALSE)
suppressMessages(suppressWarnings(library(lubridate)))
suppressMessages(suppressWarnings(library(tidyverse)))
```

### Read the files

```{r read}
fn <- "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/CSSEGISandData/COVID-19/master/csse_covid_19_data/csse_covid_19_daily_reports/"
raw_data1 <- read.csv(paste0(fn, "03-08-2020.csv"), stringsAsFactors=FALSE)
raw_data1$loc <- paste(raw_data1[[2]], raw_data1[[1]], sep=": ")
head(raw_data1)
raw_data2 <- read.csv(paste0(fn, "02-28-2020.csv"), stringsAsFactors=FALSE)
raw_data2$loc <- paste(raw_data2[[2]], raw_data2[[1]], sep=": ")
head(raw_data2)
setdiff(raw_data1$loc, raw_data2$loc)
setdiff(raw_data2$loc, raw_data1$loc)
```
